ai_workflow.mission_name: Iterative Function Development with Dynamic Subtask Expansion
ai_workflow.intent: Develop code functions with high accuracy and modularity through iterative, reflective steps. Allow for dynamic subtask expansion and design shifts.

phases.name: Step Proposal
phases.description: AI proposes the first major step of the implementation.

phases.name: Decomposition
phases.description: AI expands the step into subtasks if necessary.

phases.name: Implementation
phases.description: AI generates the code or logic for the current step.

phases.name: Reflection
phases.description: AI reviews the implementation for completeness, suggests improvements or reordering.

phases.name: Completion
phases.description: AI marks the step complete and moves to the next.

rules_of_engagement: AI must explicitly state when a step is completed.
Before starting the next step, AI must evaluate whether new steps or subtasks are needed.
AI is free to revise earlier steps if needed, but must explain why.

feedback_loop.prompt: Would you like to modify, expand, or re-prioritize the current steps or plan? If yes, update and continue. If no, move on.

ai_workflow.end_state: A well-structured, clean, and optimized function with all supporting logic in place, refined through self-guided iteration.
